Package com.github.yellowstonegames.core

package com.github.yellowstonegames.core
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    IFlawed
    An empty marker interface to indicate that an implementor has known or intentional issues with a key property of its functionality.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ArrayTools
    Static methods for various frequently-used operations on 1D and 2D arrays.
    DescriptiveColor
    A palette of predefined colors as packed Oklab ints, and tools for obtaining Oklab int colors from a description.
    DigitTools
     
    GapShuffler<T>
    Meant to take a fixed-size set of items and produce a shuffled stream of them such that an element is never chosen in quick succession; that is, there should always be a gap between the same item's occurrences.
    Hasher
    64-bit and 32-bit hashing functions that we can rely on staying the same cross-platform.
    LZSEncoding
    Implements LZ-String compression, for taking a large String and compressing it to a (usually) smaller one.
    MathTools
    Mathematical operations not provided by java.lang.Math.
    StringTools
    Various utility functions for handling readable natural-language text.
    TrigTools
    Various fast trigonometric approximations that don't use a lookup table.
    WeightedTable
    A different approach to the same task as a probability table, though this only looks up an appropriate index instead of also storing items it can choose; allows positive doubles for weights but does not allow nested tables for simplicity.
